short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss out on your anime again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of constantly checking for new episodes of your favorite anime? Do you find yourself missing out on the latest releases? Say goodbye to endless scrolling and fretting over missed episodes because AnimeSchedule is here to revolutionize your anime watching experience!

AnimeSchedule is a sleek and intuitive Chrome extension designed for anime enthusiasts like you. With just a few clicks, you can mark your favorite anime series and receive timely notifications whenever a new episode is released. No more guessing games or manual searches â€“ AnimeSchedule does the hard work for you, ensuring you never miss a single episode.

Simply select your favorite anime series from a vast database and let AnimeSchedule handle the rest. Once marked, you'll receive instant notifications whenever a new episode airs.

Find code on: https://github.com/atharvakadlag/animeschedule
